name: FiveLittleDucksIndianRhyme
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: five little ducks
des:
Five little ducks went swimming one day
Over the hill and far away
Mother duck said, "Quack quack quack quack"
But only four little ducks came back!

We have updated the skill with a more smooth and fault-free experience. We are continuing the legacy of the previous skill with a more advanced and smooth voice experience.


five little ducks Indian Rhyme will take you on an adventurous ride to the famous five little ducks right from your home. Whether it is time to sleep or dinner, play this rhyme for kids and your kid will love it.

Steps for using the skill:

Session 1:
User: Alexa, open five little ducks
Alexa: Starting five little ducks, you can say start or begin
User: Start / Begin
Alexa: Playing five little ducks
User: Alexa, next
User: Alexa, stop
User: Alexa, shuffle
User: Alexa, next / previous
User: Alexa, resume
User: Alexa, start over
User: Yes/No


Session 2:
User: Alexa, open five little ducks
Alexa: You were listening to five little ducks already, Would you like to resume?
User: No
Alexa: <Alexa starts over to play the audio from start> You are listening to the five little ducks rhyme. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.

Session 3:
User: Help
Alexa: You are listening to the five little ducks. You can say, Next or Previous to navigate through the playlist. At any time, you can say Pause to pause the audio and Resume to resume.


Once invoked, Alexa will automatically start the conversation and play the audio. Sit back, relax, and enjoy the rhyme of five little ducks. To start again on finishing one story, you can ask Alexa to open it again.


When you reach the bottom of the playlist, try saying, Alexa, start over or Alexa, shuffle

The skill is available for English and Hindi Locals but the response of the rhyme is in English which makes the skill preferable for English-speaking and listening audience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
